H0.text: Lead storage battery is the basic voltaic cell variation along with the dry cell.

H1.text: Lead flood battery is the other basic voltaic cell variation besides the dry cell.

H2.text: Positive terminal is the basic voltaic cell variation that, along with the dry cell, represents one of the basic voltaic cell variations.

H3.text: Lead electricity battery is the other basic voltaic cell variation besides the dry cell.
